context: Anybody found solution for sporadic mute/unmute touch interface failure?
response: Unfortunately I couldn't but I never found my self using that feature anyways, its very easy to just remove the touch pad from inside the keyboard, I love this keyboard but that touchpad was a pain in the butt.

context: do you get 30 days for free ? when you buy this
response: The game is free to play, it may give you 30 days of 'patron' status, which offers perks and bonuses, none of which is required to play or reach the max level.
It will work, the Windows and Alt key will act as the Command and Options key. Although, they will be reversed, this can be fixed with a program called Double Command.

context: can you put the shifter on the left hand side
response: No- its part of the housing and not movable.

context: is there still a sizeable community playing this now that Hardline is out?
response: Yes i have hardline but still plying bf4

context: Does this game require an online pass for PS3?
four batteries?! two for each remote?! or just two batteries for one remote?!
response: There is only one battery for each Wii mote that it can charge. So two batteries total

context: How do I know if this drive is the correct on for my Wii console?
response: If you have one of the original white WII unit, this is the correct DVD player for you. You will need the special hex like tool. It is not a Phillips head.

context: whats the differ in fighter and combat stick?
response: I'm sorry that I can't answer your question.  It was a gift to my friend's son and he is in Japan now.

context: I want to download the old Zelda, Kid Icarus, Mario Brothers, etc. Will this version support it? I can't seem to figure out the size of the hard disk.
response: This will support the Virtual Console of the old Zelda, Kid Icarus and Mario Brothers. If you are talking about using old NES cartridges with the Wii, that will not work. Hope this helps!

context: Can anyone confirm this uses Cherry MX Blues?
response: The older model should have the blues. The 2014's have either green or orange.

context: Will this joystick work with XP?
response: Can't guarantee it. but I would assume it will, it works fine in Windows 7; if it doesn't you can always return it...

context: Why does this one cost so much money? 2nd is only $25.
Would this work with any headphones like beats or apple headphones?
response: Yes, but keep in mind that some headsets DO NOT work properly with the adapter. The Razer Kraken Analog and most (or all) Bose headphones with in-line mic will not work due to low microphone sensitivity problems.

context: game crashes when creating a player - is this problem with game or pc (or both?)
response: I bought this game when it first came out.  I've run it with an AMD card installed and on a computer with GEForce GTX 780 Video card, Win 7 Professional, 64 bit processor, and have never had a problem with the game crashing.R
